speaker: Barista
text: Hi there! What can I get started for you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'd like a medium oat milk latte, please.

speaker: Customer
text: Hot, please. And no foam if possible.

speaker: Barista
text: You got it. That'll be five fifty.

speaker: Receptionist
text: Hi, please sign in on the tablet.

speaker: Patient
text: Sure. Do you need my insurance card?
